title: Shortest Completing Word
content: Given a string and an array of strings , find the shortest completing word in . A completing word is a word that contains all the letters in . Ignore numbers and spaces in , and treat letters as case insensitive. If a letter appears more than once in , then it must appear in the word the same number of times or more. For example, if , then it contains letters , (ignoring case), and twice. Possible completing words are , , and . Return the shortest completing word in . It is guaranteed an answer exists. If there are multiple shortest completing words, return the first one that occurs in . contains digits, letters (uppercase or lowercase), or space . consists of lower case English letters.
